statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.EngName , AA.ShortName , AA.HomePage , AA.BrandCategory , AA.BrandStyle , AA.Description , AA.UseYn
, M1.Name as BrandCategoryName , M2.Name as BrandStyleName
FROM dbo.BMBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBAS.dbo.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandCategory = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'BrandCategory' LEFT JOIN IKBAS.dbo.ACCode M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.BrandStyle = M2.Code AND M2.ParentCode = 'BrandStyle' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BrandName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.EngName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.ShortName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.BrandCategory = #BrandCategory#
AND AA.BrandStyle = #BrandStyle#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.BrandName , AA.EngName , AA.ShortName , AA.HomePage , AA.BrandCategory , AA.BrandStyle , AA.Description , AA.UseYn
, BB.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.BMBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMBrandImage BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.BrandID AND BB.ImageType = '11' WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMBrand ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, BrandName, EngName, ShortName, HomePage, BrandCategory, BrandStyle, Description, UseYn ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #BrandName#, #EngName#, #ShortName#, #HomePage#, #BrandCategory#, #BrandStyle#, #Description#, #UseYn# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMBrand SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, BrandName = #BrandName# , EngName = #EngName# , ShortName = #ShortName# , HomePage = #HomePage# , BrandCategory = #BrandCategory# , BrandStyle = #BrandStyle# , Description = #Description# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
